import React, {useState} from 'react' import sass from './registrationPage.module.sass' import {Field, reduxForm} from 'redux-form' import {required} from './FormExtras/validator' import {Input, FileInput} from './FormExtras/customInput' const Form = (props) => { let [placeHolder, setPlaceHolder] = useState('Choose files') const onPhotoAdded = (event) => { props.onPhotoAdded (event) setPlaceHolder(event.target.files[0].name) } return (
